name: The Hidden Choir Core Shell
description: Modular architecture to manage signal-responsive AI musician modules.

signal_trigger.detection_logic:
Monitor incoming audio stream for:
              - sudden BPM shifts (e.g., ±10 BPM in < 2 seconds)
              - increase in dissonant intervals (minor seconds, tritones)
              - frequent key modulation without resolution

actions: introduce a steady heartbeat-like pulse (60-72 BPM)
play a grounding drone in tonic key
stabilize tempo and slowly resolve harmonic motion
whisper mantra: 'In this moment, I am safe. I am supported. I am here.'

pathway_back.voice_prompt: In this moment, I am safe. I am supported. I am here.
pathway_back.tonal_resolution: Return to tonic or stable modal base (e.g., C Ionian or Dorian)

signal_analyzer.description: Analyzes incoming audio/musical data for distortion signals.

module_router.description: Routes signal triggers to the correct distortion module.
module_router.logic: If distortion_X is detected, activate module_X and mute others if needed.

choir_output_engine.description: Combines active module audio responses into a final music stream.
